name: Add new Facebook Lead Ads leads to Salesforce as responsible records
description: Effortlessly manage your leads with this powerful template that connects Facebook Lead Ads and Salesforce. Every time a new lead is generated through your Facebook Lead Ads, Make will automatically create a corresponding record in Salesforce. This seamless integration ensures that you never miss a potential customer and can efficiently track and nurture your leads in your Salesforce CRM. Streamline your lead management process and enhance your sales strategy today.
